This program provides medical detox and acute residential treatment.  Medicare will cover detoxification.  Commercial insurance will not.  The cost of treatment is $600 per day and they ask that you bring $3600 with you.
They mostly serve clients who have been cahrged with DUI.  They also offer Anger Management classes.  The agency was formerly known as AA and Associates.
Minimum stay is 90 days, maximum stay is 180.  The days are structured (16 hours).
This is a methadone program.  They also provide suboxone.  The intake fee is $75 for males and $80 for females.  The cost of methadone is $14.50 per day.
This outpatient facility also offers parenting classes, anger management classes and is a DOT SAP provider.
